title.value: Предельно допустимая интенсивность дождевания при утилизационном поливе
A minimum admissible intensity of the sprinkler irrigation at salvaging watering

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Anzhenkov, A.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented the design procedure of is minimum necessary intensity of sprinkler irrigation of cattle-breeding flows providing salvaging of their annual production. Ways of the coordination admissible and necessary intensity of sprinkler irrigation are resulted. The most promising direction represents change in the area of farmland used for recycling. This method does not require any changes in the number of livestock, the annual additional measures for soil treatment, but requires relatively large non-recurring capital expenditures for the expansion of the irrigation network. Inability to quickly change the parameters of the utilizing system and the simultaneous need for wastewater disposal volumes exceeding agronomic requirements leads to the problem of determining the mode of utilization of irrigation with minimal impact on the environment. Most efficiently this problem is solved by increasing irrigation period and exceeding the optimal intensity of irrigation within the limits which do not lead to long-term or non-recoverable soil erosion.
